extendedIngredients.name: fat free vanilla yogurt
extendedIngredients.originalString: 6 ounces vanilla dairy-free yogurt (So Delicious Vanilla Greek Cultured Almond Milk was used here)
metaInformation: (So Delicious Vanilla Greek Cultured Almond Milk was used here)

extendedIngredients.name: old-fashioned oats
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3/4 cup quick or old-fashioned oats (can use certified gluten-free oats)

extendedIngredients.name: strawberries
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 to 4 strawberries, cleaned, hulled and halved

recipes.title: Healthy Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast
recipes.instructions: Cut each strawberry into 4 to 6 pieces (depends on how big each strawberry).In a bowl, put the vanilla greek cultured almond milk, oats, cut strawberries (reserve 2 to 3 pieces for topping) and almond plus. Stir well, cover and refrigerate for 12 hours.When served, put reserved strawberries on top. Enjoy cooled strawberry oatmeal.If you prefer sweeter taste and the strawberries are not sweet enough, add agave or sugar.

steps.step: Cut each strawberry into 4 to 6 pieces (depends on how big each strawberry).In a bowl, put the vanilla greek cultured almond milk, oats, cut strawberries (reserve 2 to 3 pieces for topping) and almond plus. Stir well, cover and refrigerate for 12 hours.When served, put reserved strawberries on top. Enjoy cooled strawberry oatmeal.If you prefer sweeter taste and the strawberries are not sweet enough, add agave or sugar.
